testsuite.name: tests.myProfile.TestMyProfile
testsuite.system-out: STEP - Navigate to Magento Website Home Page. STEP - Opening Browser Successfully... Verified - Default Welcome Message is Displayed. STEP - Go to Customer Log In Page and Validate Authenicated User Log In. Click - SignIn Verified - Customer Log In Page is Displayed STEP - Set username and Password Click - SignIn Verified - Logged In User Welcome Message is Displayed STEP - Go to My Account Click - Change Click Link As - My Account Verified - My Account Page is Displayed STEP - Validate Account Information Verified - User Name is Correct Verified - User Email Id is Correct Verified - User is not Subscribed to news letter STEP - Validate Address Book Verified - Billing Address is Correct Verified - Shipping Address is Correct STEP - Go to My Orders Click Link As - My Orders Verified - My Orders Section is Displayed Verified - You have placed no orders. STEP - Go to My Downloadable Products Click Link As - My Downloadable Products Verified - My Downloadable Products Section is Displayed Verified - You have not purchased any downloadable products yet. STEP - Go to My Wish List Click Link As - My Wish List Verified - My Wish List Section is Displayed Verified - You have no items in your wish list. STEP - Go to Stored Payment Methods Click Link As - Stored Payment Methods Verified - Stored Payment Methods Section is Displayed Verified - You have no stored payment methods. STEP - Go to My Product Reviews Click Link As - My Product Reviews Verified - My Product Reviews Section is Displayed Verified - You have submitted no reviews. STEP - Go to Newsletter Subscription Click Link As - Newsletter Subscriptions Verified - Newsletter Subscription Section is Displayed STEP - Go to Saved Cards Click Link As - Saved card Verified - Saved Cards Section is Displayed STEP - Sign Out Click - Change Click Link As - Sign Out Verified - Sign Out Message is Displayed Verified - Sign Out Information Message is Displayed STEP - Closing Browser Successfully...
